name: TX_DIAG_ALT
description: Table lists all diagnoses matched to the charge from the alternative diagnosis code set.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique internal ID of the accounts receivable transaction record representing this charge.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis associated with the charge transaction.  This diagnosis is from the alternate codeset.

columns.name: DX_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: The diagnosis qualifier category ID for theï¿½transaction. Indicates if diagnosis is: 1 - Active 2 - Acute 3 - Chronic.
